Package ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.canvas

Provides the canvas component for the Application API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GraphCanvasSelectionListener An interface for classes that want to listen to selection events fired from a GraphCanvasSelectionModel.
 

Class Summary
CanvasNode A component that visualizes an OpNode.
CanvasNodeField A component that displays either an InputField or an OutputField.
CanvasNodeName A text field that displays the name of a node.
CanvasOverlay A full-canvas component to draw things on top of everything else.
DefaultNodeBorder  
GraphCanvas A canvas for creating/modifying an OpGraph.
GraphCanvasSelectionModel Selection model used in a GraphCanvas.
GridLayer A grid component intended for displaying on the background of a GraphCanvas component.
LinksLayer A full-canvas component to draw links between node fields
NodeStyle A class containing styling information for a node.
 

Enum Summary
CanvasNodeField.AnchorFillState State for link anchor points on this field.
 

Package ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.canvas Description

Provides the canvas component for the Application API. The canvas is the primary component used for displaying and editing OpGraphs.
